Description: Fragment of lid of East Greek pottery vessel; plastic moulding on upper surface at join of lid and rim. Interior reserved. Exterior slipped cream; from the centre: tongues; two dilute lines; band of dots; wavy line between bands with added red band lined in white; dots; two dilute lines; volut and palmette frieze (red for central palmette leaf and centre of volute); band with added red band lined in white; dots on moulding; top of rim glazed with added red band lined in white; bars on outside.
Bibliographic references: Price 1924 / Pottery of Naukratis (pl. VIII, no. 2)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1066)
